ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron growls as she ducks Reptilica and Bloodystrike s shots. She unsheathes her sword and fires several optic blasts as the two before turning to face her

Tavatron growls as she ducks Reptilica and Bloodystrike's shots. She 
unsheathes her sword and fires several optic blasts as the two before 
turning to face her commander:

"This is suicide! What now?" 

Tavatron fired off several more shots before reaching behind her
back, 
as if to grab her staff. She growls, remembering that she had left
her 
staff somewhere on the battlefield. She turns to face Zardus,
snarling 
threateningly. She charges the Alliance leader, her optics glowing a 
bright blue, as if she was about to fire an optic blast. She raises 
her sword above her head and brings it down and across Zardus' chest.
